source: Sayyid Abul Ala Maududi - Tafhim al-Qur'an - The Meaning of the Quran
short_text: The Surah takes its name from the word dhil Ma'arij in verse 3.
text:
The Surah takes its name from the word dhil Ma'arij in verse 3.

Period of Revelation

The subject matter bears evidence that this Surah too was sent down in conditions closely resembling those under which Surah Al Haaqqah was sent down.

Theme and Subject Matter

It admonishes and gives warning to the disbelievers who made fun of the news about Resurrection and the Hereafter, and Hell and Heaven, and challenged the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) to cause Resurrection with which he threatened them to take place if what he said was true and they had become worthy of the punishment in Hell by denying it. The whole Surah is meant to answer this denial.

The Surah opens with words to the effect:"A demander has demanded a torment, the torment which must befall the deniers; and when it takes place, there will be none to prevent it, but it will take place at its own appointed time. Allah has His own way of doing things, but He is not unjust. Therefore, have patience, O Prophet, at what they say. They think it is far off, but We see it as near at hand."

Then it is said:"Resurrection, which they desire to be hastened out of jest and fun, is terrible, and when it comes, it will cause great distress to the culprits. At that time they will even be prepared to give away their wives and children and their nearest kinsfolk in ransom to escape the punishment, but they will not be able to escape it.

Then the people have been warned to the effect; "On that Day the destinies of men will be decided strictly on the basis of their belief and their conduct. Those who turn away from the Truth in the world and amass wealth and withhold it from the needy, will be doomed to Hell; and those who fear the punishment of God here, believe in the Hereafter, keep up the Prayer, discharge the rights of the needy out of their wealth, strictly avoid immoral and wicked deeds, practice honesty in all their dealings, fulfill their pledges and trust and bear true witness, will have a place of honor in Paradise"

In conclusion, the disbelievers of Makkah who rushed in upon the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) from every side as soon as they saw him, in order to make fun of him, have been warned to the effect: "If you do not believe, Allah will replace you by other people who will be better than you", and the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) has been consoled, so as to say: "Do not take to heart their mockery and jesting; leave them to indulge in their idle talk and foolish conduct if they are bent upon experiencing the disgrace and humiliation of the Resurrection; they will themselves see their evil end."'
description: The surah that proclaims God to be the Lord of the heavenly ascents, Lofty Stations, the points of rising from which the angels ascend to God. It takes is named after the phrase “of lofty stations” (dhi al-maʿārij) in verse 3. The surah describes the Day of Judgement (verse 8 .). One of the opponents of the Prophet challenged him to hasten the punishment they had been threatened with (verse 1), so the foolishness of the disbelievers in denying the Resurrection (verse 6) is exposed (verse 36 .). The people who will be granted the Garden are described (verse 22 .).The surah is also known as: Elevations, Staircases Upward, The Ascending Steps, The Heavenly Ascents, The Ladders, The Stairways, The Steps, The Ways of Ascent.

Efendi Nahi.verse 70:1: Një kurreshtar ka pyetur për dënimin që do të ngjajë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:2: ndaj jobesimtarëve, - për të cilin dënim s’ka pengues,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:3: (ai dënim është) prej Perëndisë, Zotit të shkallëve të larta (të mirësisë),
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:4: ngjiten (hipin) tek Ai engjëjt dhe Shpirti (Xhebraili) në një ditë që zgjatë sa pesëdhjetë mijë vjet (sipas llogarisë së kohës sonë në Tokë),
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:5: andaj, bëhu i durueshëm, me durim të bukur.
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:6: Ata, me të vërtetë, (dënimin) e mendojnë të largët (të pamundshëm),
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:7: kurse Ne, e dimë të afërt,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:8: atë Ditë kur qielli do të bëhet si llom i vajit,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:9: e malet do të bëhen si lesh (i shprishur) llojlloj ngjyrash;
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:10: kur i afërmi nuk pyet asgjë për të afërmin,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:12: me gruan e vet dhe vëllain e vet,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:13: dhe me farefisin e tij të ngushtë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:14: si dhe me të gjithë ata që gjenden në faqe të Tokës – vetëm për të shpëtuar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:16: që duke e kapur për kokë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:17: e tërheq kah veti atë (njeri) që ia ka kthyer shpinën dhe i është shmangur të vërtetës!
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:18: Dhe ka grumbulluar (pasuri) dhe ka depozituar (duke mos dhënë asgjë).
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:19: Njeriu, me të vërtetë, është krijuar lakmus vetjak:
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:20: kur e goditë e liga – dëshpërohet
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:21: e kur t’i bie e mira – bëhet koprrac (nuk jep – refuzon),
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:23: të cilët në lutjet e veta (namaz) janë të qëndrueshëm;
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:24: dhe që në pasurinë e tyre ka të caktuar një pjesë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:25: për lypësin dhe për të varfërin (që nuk e zgjatë dorën),
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:26: dhe ata që besojnë Ditën e Kijametit
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:27: dhe ata që druajnë nga dënimi i Zotit të tyre, -
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:28: e, me të vërtetë, (askush) nuk është i sigurtë prej dënimit të Zotit të vet –
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:29: dhe ata që i ruajnë pjesët e turpshme të organizmit të vet,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:30: përveç ndaj bashkëshorteve të tyre dhe ato që i kanë në pronësi – at, a me të vërtetë, nuk meritojnë qortim, -
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:31: e kush kërkon jashtë këtyre caqeve, është kundërvajtës,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:32: edhe ata që i ruajnë amanetet dhe i plotësojnë obligimet e tyre,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:33: edhe ata që dëshminë e tyre e zbatojnë
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:34: edhe ata të cilët e kryejnë namazin (në kohën) e rregullt,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:35: ata në kopshtie të xhennetit do të nderohen.
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:38: E që çdonjëri prej tyre dëshiron të hyjë në xhennetin e dhuntive (pa merita)? –
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:39: Kurrsesi! Ne, me të vërtetë, i kemi krijuar ata, prej asaj që e dinë!
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:40: Dhe, Unë betohem me Zotin e lindjes dhe të perëndimit, që ne mundemi
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:41: t’i ndërrojmë ata me më të mirë prej tyre dhe Ne nuk jeni të penguar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:42: Andaj, lëri ti ata le të zbaviten me gjëra të kota dhe të luajnë përderisa të hasin në Ditën e tyre të caktuar,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:43: Dita në të cilën dalin nga varrezat duke vrapuar, thuajse po nxitojnë te idolet e tyre,
Efendi Nahi.verse 70:44: me sy të varur që i ka kapluar poshtërimi.

null.verse 70:1: (Kafirlərdən) biri vaqe olacaq əzab (qiyamət əzabının nə vaxt və kimə üz verəcəyi) barədə soruşdu.
null.verse 70:2: (O əzabı) kafirlərdən dəf edə biləcək bir kimsə yoxdur!
null.verse 70:3: (O əzab yüksək) dərəcələr sahibi olan Allahdandır!
null.verse 70:4: Mələklər və ruh (Cəbrail) Onun dərgahına (dünya ilə müqayisədə) müddəti əlli min il olan bir gündə qalxarlar.
null.verse 70:5: (Ya Peyğəmbər! Kafirlərin əziyyətlərinə) mətanətlə (heç bir təlaş, narahatlıq keçirmədən) səbr et!
null.verse 70:6: Şübhəsiz ki, onlar (müşriklər) onu (o əzabı) uzaq görürlər (ona inanmırlar).
null.verse 70:7: Biz isə onu yaxın görürük (ona inanırıq).
null.verse 70:8: O gün göy göyərmiş mis kimi olacaq;
null.verse 70:9: Dağlar da didilmiş (rəngbərəng) yun kimi olacaqdır.
null.verse 70:10: Və dost dostu arayıb axtarmayacaqdır (hərə öz hayına qalacaqdır).
null.verse 70:11: Onlar bir-birinə göstəriləcəklər (lakin bir-birini tanısalar da, özlərini tanımamazlığa vurub bir-birindən qaçacaqlar).
null.verse 70:13: (Cətin günlərdə) ona sığınacaq verən əşirətini (qohum-əqrabasını);
null.verse 70:14: Və yer üzündə olanların hamısını - təki özünü (Allahın əzabından) qurtarsın!
null.verse 70:15: Xeyr (bu mümkün deyildir).
null.verse 70:16: (Elə bir atəş ki) başın dərisini sıyırıb çıxardır (dərini sümükdən ayırır).
null.verse 70:17: Cağırır (o Cəhənnəm itaətdən) çıxanı, (imandan) üz döndərəni
null.verse 70:18: Və (mal-dövlət) yığıb saxlayanı! (Allahın payını verməyəni; acizə, yoxsula əl tutmayanı!)
null.verse 70:19: Həqiqətən, insan (sərvətə) çox həris (tamahkar və kəmhövsələ) yaradılmışdır!
null.verse 70:20: Ona bir pislik üz verdikdə fəryad qoparar.
null.verse 70:21: Ona bir xeyir nəsib olduqda isə xəsis olar.
null.verse 70:23: O kəslər ki, daim namaz qılarlar;
null.verse 70:24: O kəslər ki, onların mallarında müəyyən bir haqq (pay) vardır -
null.verse 70:25: Dilənən və (hər şeydən) məhrum olan (lakin abrına qısılıb dilənməyən) kimsə üçün;
null.verse 70:26: O kəslər ki, haqq-hesab gününü təsdiq edərlər;
null.verse 70:27: O kəslər ki, Rəbbinin əzabından qorxub tir-tir əsərlər;
null.verse 70:28: Cünki onların Rəbbinin əzabından (bu əzabın kiməsə toxunub-toxunmayacağından) arxayın olmaq olmaz;
null.verse 70:29: O kəslər ki, ayıb yerlərini qoruyub saxlayarlar (zina etməzlər);
null.verse 70:30: ?vrətləri və cariyələri istisna olmaqla.
null.verse 70:31: Bundan artığını istəyənlər isə həddi aşanlardır;
null.verse 70:32: O kəslər ki, əmanətə xəyanət etməz, verdikləri sözü yerinə yetirərlər;
null.verse 70:33: O kəslər ki, düzgün şəhadət verərlər
null.verse 70:34: Və o kəslər ki, namazlarını (layiqincə) hifz edərlər-
null.verse 70:35: Məhz onlar cənnətlərdə ehtiram olunacaq (əzizlənəcək) kimsələrdir!
null.verse 70:36: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Kafirlərə nə olub ki, (boyunlarını qabağa uzadıb) sənə tərəf tələsirlər?
null.verse 70:37: Sağdan və soldan dəstə-dəstə gəlirlər?
null.verse 70:38: Məgər onların hər biri Nəim cənnətlərinəmi daxil olacağına ümid edir?
null.verse 70:39: Xeyr! (Bu ola bilməz).
null.verse 70:40: Məşriqlərin və məğriblərin Rəbbinə and olsun ki, Biz, həqiqətən, qadirik.
null.verse 70:41: Onları özlərindən daha yaxşısı ilə əvəz etməyə (onları məhv edib yerlərinə Allaha müt'i olan başqa bir məxluq gətirməyə).
null.verse 70:42: Elə isə (ya Peyğəmbər!) qoy onlar və'd olunduqları günə qovuşanadək (batil əməllərinə) dalsınlar və oynayıb-əylənsinlər!
null.verse 70:43: O gün onlar (dünyada ibadət etdikləri) bütlərin yanına tələsirmişlər kimi qəbirlərdən tez-tələsik çıxacaqlar.
null.verse 70:44: Onların gözləri zəlilcəsinə yerə dikiləcək, özlərini də zillət bürüyəcəkdir.

null.verse 70:1: Neko je zatražio da se kazna izvrši
null.verse 70:2: nad nevjernicima - niko ne može spriječiti
null.verse 70:3: da to Allah, Gospodar nebesa, ne učini,
null.verse 70:4: k Njemu se penju meleki i Džibril u danu koji pedeset hiljada godina traje,
null.verse 70:5: zato ti budi strpljiv ne jadikujući,
null.verse 70:6: Oni misle da se dogoditi neće,
null.verse 70:7: a Mi znamo da sigurno hoće,
null.verse 70:8: onoga Dana kada nebo bude kao talog od zejtina,
null.verse 70:9: a brda kao vuna šarena,
null.verse 70:10: kada bližnji neće bližnjega ništa pitati,
null.verse 70:11: iako će jedni druge vidjeti.
null.verse 70:12: i ženom svojom, i bratom svojim,
null.verse 70:13: i porodicim svojom koja ga štiti,
null.verse 70:14: i svima ostalima na Zemlji - samo da se izbavi.
null.verse 70:15: Nikada! Ona će buktinja sama biti
null.verse 70:17: zvaće onoga ko je glavu okretao i izbjegavao
null.verse 70:18: i zgrtao i skrivao.
null.verse 70:19: Čovjek je, uistinu, stvoren malodušan:
null.verse 70:20: kada ga nevolja snađe - brižan je,
null.verse 70:21: a kada mu je dobro - nepristupačan je,
null.verse 70:23: koji molitve svoje budu na vrijeme obavljali,
null.verse 70:24: i oni u čijim imecima bude određen dio
null.verse 70:25: za onoga koji prosi i za onoga koji ne prosi,
null.verse 70:26: i oni koji u onaj svijet budu vjerovali,
null.verse 70:27: i oni koji od kazne Gospodara svoga budu strahovali -
null.verse 70:28: a od kazne Gospodara svoga niko nije siguran -
null.verse 70:29: i oni koji stidna mjesta svoja budu čuvali
null.verse 70:30: i živjeli jedino sa ženama svojim ili sa onima koje su u vlasništvu njihovu - oni, doista, prijekor ne zaslužuju -
null.verse 70:31: a oni koji traže izvan toga, oni u grijeh upadaju,
null.verse 70:32: i oni koji povjerene im amanete budu čuvali i obaveze svoje ispunjavali,
null.verse 70:33: i oni koji dug svjedočenja svoga budu izvršavali,
null.verse 70:34: i oni koji molitve svoje budu revnosno obavljali -
null.verse 70:35: oni će u džennetskim baščama biti počašćeni.
null.verse 70:36: Zašto se nevjernici prema tebi žure,
null.verse 70:37: zdesna i slijeva, u gomilama?!
null.verse 70:38: Kako svaki od njih žudi da u Džennet uživanja uđe?
null.verse 70:39: Nikada! Mi ih stvaramo, od čega - oni znaju!
null.verse 70:40: I Ja se kunem Gospodarom istoka i zapada da ih možemo
null.verse 70:41: boljim od njih zamijeniti i niko nas u tome ne može spriječiti.
null.verse 70:42: Zato ih ostavi neka se napričaju i nazabavljaju dok Dan kojim im se prijeti ne dočekaju,
null.verse 70:43: Dan u kome će žurno kao da kumirima hrle iz grobova izići,
null.verse 70:44: oborenih pogleda i poniženjem oprhvani.

null.verse 70:1: একব্যক্তি চাইল, সেই আযাব সংঘটিত হোক যা অবধারিত-
null.verse 70:2: কাফেরদের জন্যে, যার প্রতিরোধকারী কেউ নেই।
null.verse 70:3: তা আসবে আল্লাহ তা’আলার পক্ষ থেকে, যিনি সমুন্নত মর্তবার অধিকারী।
null.verse 70:4: ফেরেশতাগণ এবং রূহ আল্লাহ তা’আলার দিকে উর্ধ্বগামী হয় এমন একদিনে, যার পরিমাণ পঞ্চাশ হাজার বছর।
null.verse 70:6: তারা এই আযাবকে সুদূরপরাহত মনে করে,
null.verse 70:7: আর আমি একে আসন্ন দেখছি।
null.verse 70:8: সেদিন আকাশ হবে গলিত তামার মত।
null.verse 70:9: এবং পর্বতসমূহ হবে রঙ্গীন পশমের মত,
null.verse 70:10: বন্ধু বন্ধুর খবর নিবে না।
null.verse 70:11: যদিও একে অপরকে দেখতে পাবে। সেদিন গোনাহগার ব্যক্তি পনস্বরূপ দিতে চাইবে তার সন্তান-সন্ততিকে,
null.verse 70:13: তার গোষ্ঠীকে, যারা তাকে আশ্রয় দিত।
null.verse 70:14: এবং পৃথিবীর সবকিছুকে, অতঃপর নিজেকে রক্ষা করতে চাইবে।
null.verse 70:15: কখনই নয়। নিশ্চয় এটা লেলিহান অগ্নি।
null.verse 70:17: সে সেই ব্যক্তিকে ডাকবে যে সত্যের প্রতি পৃষ্ঠপ্রদর্শন করেছিল ও বিমুখ হয়েছিল।
null.verse 70:18: সম্পদ পুঞ্জীভূত করেছিল, অতঃপর আগলিয়ে রেখেছিল।
null.verse 70:19: মানুষ তো সৃজিত হয়েছে ভীরুরূপে।
null.verse 70:20: যখন তাকে অনিষ্ট স্পর্শ করে, তখন সে হা-হুতাশ করে।
null.verse 70:21: আর যখন কল্যাণপ্রাপ্ত হয়, তখন কৃপণ হয়ে যায়।
null.verse 70:22: তবে তারা স্বতন্ত্র, যারা নামায আদায় কারী।
null.verse 70:23: যারা তাদের নামাযে সার্বক্ষণিক কায়েম থাকে।
null.verse 70:24: এবং যাদের ধন-সম্পদে নির্ধারিত হক আছে
null.verse 70:25: যাঞ্ছাকারী ও বঞ্চিতের
null.verse 70:26: এবং যারা প্রতিফল দিবসকে সত্য বলে বিশ্বাস করে।
null.verse 70:27: এবং যারা তাদের পালনকর্তার শাস্তির সম্পর্কে ভীত-কম্পিত।
null.verse 70:28: নিশ্চয় তাদের পালনকর্তার শাস্তি থেকে নিঃশঙ্কা থাকা যায় না।
null.verse 70:29: এবং যারা তাদের যৌন-অঙ্গকে সংযত রাখে
null.verse 70:30: কিন্তু তাদের স্ত্রী অথবা মালিকানাভূক্ত দাসীদের বেলায় তিরস্কৃত হবে না।
null.verse 70:31: অতএব, যারা এদের ছাড়া অন্যকে কামনা করে, তারাই সীমালংঘনকারী।
null.verse 70:32: এবং যারা তাদের আমানত ও অঙ্গীকার রক্ষা করে
null.verse 70:33: এবং যারা তাদের সাক্ষ্যদানে সরল-নিষ্ঠাবান
null.verse 70:34: এবং যারা তাদের নামাযে যত্নবান,
null.verse 70:35: তারাই জান্নাতে সম্মানিত হবে।
null.verse 70:36: অতএব, কাফেরদের কি হল যে, তারা আপনার দিকে উর্ধ্বশ্বাসে ছুটে আসছে।
null.verse 70:37: ডান ও বামদিক থেকে দলে দলে।
null.verse 70:38: তাদের প্রত্যেকেই কি আশা করে যে, তাকে নেয়ামতের জান্নাতে দাখিল করা হবে?
null.verse 70:39: কখনই নয়, আমি তাদেরকে এমন বস্তু দ্বারা সৃষ্টি করেছি, যা তারা জানে।
null.verse 70:40: আমি শপথ করছি উদয়াচল ও অস্তাচলসমূহের পালনকর্তার, নিশ্চয়ই আমি সক্ষম!
null.verse 70:41: তাদের পরিবর্তে উৎকৃষ্টতর মানুষ সৃষ্টি করতে এবং এটা আমার সাধ্যের অতীত নয়।
null.verse 70:42: অতএব, আপনি তাদেরকে ছেড়ে দিন, তারা বাকবিতন্ডা ও ক্রীড়া-কৌতুক করুক সেই দিবসের সম্মুখীন হওয়া পর্যন্ত, যে দিবসের ওয়াদা তাদের সাথে করা হচ্ছে।
null.verse 70:43: সে দিন তারা কবর থেকে দ্রুতবেগে বের হবে, যেন তারা কোন এক লক্ষ্যস্থলের দিকে ছুটে যাচ্ছে।
null.verse 70:44: তাদের দৃষ্টি থাকবে অবনমিত; তারা হবে হীনতাগ্রস্ত। এটাই সেইদিন, যার ওয়াদা তাদেরকে দেয়া হত। যাচ্ছে।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:1: Един човек попита за неизбежното мъчение.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:2: Никой не ще го отблъсне от неверниците.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:3: То е от Аллах, Владетеля на небесните стъпала.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:4: Ще се въздигнат към Него ангелите и Духът
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:5: в Ден, колкото петдесет хиляди години,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:6: затова търпи с добро търпение [о, Мухаммад]!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:9: В този Ден небето ще е като разтопена мед
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:10: и планините ще са като вълна,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:11: и не ще пита приятел за приятеля,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:13: и съпругата си, и брат си,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:14: и рода си, който го подслонява,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:15: и всички, които са на земята, само за да се спаси.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:16: Ала не! Това е лумнал Огън,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:18: зове той всеки, който обръща гръб на вярата и се отвръща,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:22: а щом го настигне доброто - скъперник,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:24: които в своята молитва са постоянни
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:25: и в чиито имоти е заделен дял
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:27: и които смятат за истина Съдния ден,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:28: и които се страхуват от мъчението на своя Господ -
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:29: мъчението на техния Господ не е безопасно,-
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:31: освен за техните съпруги или за владените от техните десници.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:32: А които се стремят към друго освен това - тези са престъпващите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:33: И които повереното на тях, и техния обет съблюдават,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:34: и които в своите свидетелства са правдиви,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:35: и които молитвите си усърдно отслужват,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:36: те ще бъдат на почит в Градините.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:37: Какво им е на неверниците, втренчили в теб погледи
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:39: Нима всеки от тях копнее да влезе в Градината на блаженството?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:40: Ала не! Сътворихме ги от онова, което знаят.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:41: И не! Кълна се в Господа на изгревите и на залезите, Ние сме способни
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:42: да ги заменим с по-добри от тях.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:43: Остави ги да тънат и да се забавляват, додето срещнат своя Ден, който им е обещан!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:44: Деня, в който ще излязат забързани от гробовете, сякаш се устремяват към идолите,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 70:45: със сведен поглед, покрити с унижение.

null.verse 70:1: 有人曾請求一種將發生的刑罰。
null.verse 70:2: 那是為不信的人們而預定的，沒有任何人能加以抵抗。
null.verse 70:3: 那是真主——天梯的主宰——發出的，
null.verse 70:4: 眾天神和精神在一日之內升到他那裡。那一日的長度是五萬年。
null.verse 70:6: 他們以為那刑罰是很遠的，
null.verse 70:7: 我卻以為那是很近的。
null.verse 70:8: 在那日天像熔銅，
null.verse 70:9: 山像彩絨。
null.verse 70:10: 親戚相見不相同。
null.verse 70:11: 罪人願意贖取那日的刑罰，即使犧牲他的兒女、
null.verse 70:13: 和那收容他的血族，
null.verse 70:14: 以及大地上所有的人，但願那能拯救自己。
null.verse 70:15: 絕不然，那確是發焰的烈火，
null.verse 70:17: 能召喚轉身而逃避的人。
null.verse 70:18: 他曾聚積財產而加以保藏，
null.verse 70:19: 人確是被造成浮躁的，
null.verse 70:20: 遭遇災殃的時候是煩惱的，
null.verse 70:21: 獲得財富的時候是吝嗇的。
null.verse 70:22: 只有禮拜的人們，不是那樣，
null.verse 70:23: 他們是常守拜功的；
null.verse 70:24: 他們的財產中有一個定份，
null.verse 70:25: 是用於施濟乞丐和貧民的；
null.verse 70:26: 他們是承認報應之日的；
null.verse 70:27: 他們是畏懼他們的主的刑罰的。
null.verse 70:28: 他們的主的刑罰，確是難保不降臨的。
null.verse 70:29: 他們是保守貞操的，
null.verse 70:30: 除非對自己的妻子和奴婢，他們確是不因此而受責備的；
null.verse 70:31: 凡在這個範圍之外有所要求的人，都是過份的。
null.verse 70:32: 他們是尊重自己所受的信托，和自己所締的盟約的；
null.verse 70:33: 他們是秉公作証的；
null.verse 70:34: 他們是謹守拜功的。
null.verse 70:35: 這等人，是在樂園中受優待的。
null.verse 70:36: 不信道的人們，怎麼注視著你，三五成群的分列
null.verse 70:37: 在你的左右呢？
null.verse 70:38: 難道他們每個人都希望入恩澤的樂園嗎？
null.verse 70:39: 絕不然！我確已用他們所知道的物質創造了他們。
null.verse 70:40: 不然，我以一切東方和西方的主盟誓，我確是全能的，
null.verse 70:41: 我能以比他們更好的人代替他們，我不是無能的。
null.verse 70:42: 你應當任他們妄談，任他們遊戲，直到他們看到他們所被警告的日子。
null.verse 70:43: 在那日，他們將從墳中出來奔走，他們好像奔到牌位一樣，
null.verse 70:44: 同時，他們身遭凌辱，不敢仰視。那是他們被警告的日子。 在那日，他們將從墳中出來奔走，他們好像奔到牌位一樣，

null.verse 70:1: Ptal se tázající na trest, jenž dopadne
null.verse 70:2: na nevěřící: není nikoho, kdo jej odrazí,
null.verse 70:3: vždyť od Boha, Pána stupňů, přichází!
null.verse 70:4: Stoupají k němu po nich andělé i duch v den, jehož délka let padesát tisíc měří.
null.verse 70:5: Neochvějný buď a pěkně jen vytrvej!
null.verse 70:6: Nevěřící daleko vidí ten den,
null.verse 70:7: zatímco my nablízku jej vidíme.
null.verse 70:8: V ten den nebe bude roztavené mosazi podobné
null.verse 70:9: a hory budou jak vločky vlny barevné
null.verse 70:10: a nebude se ptát přítel vřelý na přítele,
null.verse 70:11: ačkoliv budou na dohled.
null.verse 70:12: i bratrem svým a družkou svou
null.verse 70:13: a klanem vlastním, jenž mu je ochranou,
null.verse 70:14: ba všemi, kdož na zemi jsou, aby se to stalo jeho záchranou.
null.verse 70:15: Však pozor! Toto věru je oheň šlehající,
null.verse 70:17: jenž svolává toho, kdo zády se otočil a odvrátil
null.verse 70:18: a majetek shromažďoval a nakupil.
null.verse 70:19: Člověk byl věru stvořen vrtkavý:
null.verse 70:20: když dotkne se ho neštěstí, je ustrašený,
null.verse 70:21: když dotkne se jej dobré, je odmítavý.
null.verse 70:22: Ne tak ti, kdo se modlí,
null.verse 70:23: kdo v modlitbách jsou vytrvalí,
null.verse 70:24: kdo stanovili podíl z jmění svého
null.verse 70:25: pro žebráka i nešťastníka nemajetného
null.verse 70:26: a kdo den soudný za pravdivý uznávají
null.verse 70:27: a trestu Pána svého se obávají
null.verse 70:28: - vždyť před trestem Pána tvého nikdo jist si není -
null.verse 70:29: a kdo svá pohlaví chrání
null.verse 70:30: jen pro manželky své či otrokyně; a nebudou za to pokáráni -
null.verse 70:31: kdož však více než po tomto touží, to věru jsou přestupníci;
null.verse 70:32: a kdo svěřené opatrují a úmluvy své pevně dodržují
null.verse 70:33: a kdo při svědectvích svých v pravdě stojí
null.verse 70:34: a o modlitby své pilně dbají -
null.verse 70:35: takoví v zahradách rajských se s poctami setkají!
null.verse 70:36: Co děje se s nevěřícími, že k tobě krky natahují
null.verse 70:37: a zprava i zleva se shlukují?
null.verse 70:38: Žádá snad každý z nich, aby uveden byl do zahrad slastí?
null.verse 70:39: Však pozor! Stvořili jsme je věru z toho, co sami dobře znají.
null.verse 70:40: Však pozor! Přísahám při Pánu východů i západů, že vskutku schopni jsme
null.verse 70:41: lepšími, než oni jsou, je vystřídat, a předejít se v tom nedáme.
null.verse 70:42: Nech je být, ať si tlachají a hrají, až se setkají se svým dnem, jenž byl jim přislíben,
null.verse 70:43: se dnem, kdy z hrobů jako by k obětištím chvátali vystoupí se spěchem,
null.verse 70:44: se zrakem zahanbeným, pokryti ponížením.

null.verse 70:1: Men vraagt naar de straf, die straks zal vallen
null.verse 70:2: Over de ongelovigen, die niemand kan weerhouden,
null.verse 70:3: Van God, de Heer der wegen die omhoog leiden.
null.verse 70:4: De engelen en de geest gaan tot Hem op, in een Dag waarvan de maat vijftig duizend jaren is.
null.verse 70:6: Zij (de ongelovigen) zien (de straf) ver weg.
null.verse 70:7: Maar Wij zien die nabij.
null.verse 70:8: De Dag waarop de hemelen als gesmolten koper zullen worden
null.verse 70:9: En de bergen als zachte, gekleurde wol,
null.verse 70:10: En een vriend zal een vriend niet vragen,
null.verse 70:11: Hoewel zij elkander kunnen zien.
null.verse 70:12: En zijn vrouw en zijn broeder,
null.verse 70:13: En zijn familieleden die hem een toevlucht waren,
null.verse 70:14: En allen die op aarde zijn, om zich te redden.
null.verse 70:15: Stellig niet! Waarlijk het is een laaiend Vuur.
null.verse 70:17: Het zal hem opeisen, die zich afwendt en wegloopt
null.verse 70:18: En rijkdommen verzamelt, en deze (gierig) terughoudt.
null.verse 70:19: Voorwaar, de mens is geschapen met een ongeduldige aard.
null.verse 70:20: Als hem kwaad overkomt, is hij vol weeklagen,
null.verse 70:21: Maar als hem goed wedervaart, is hij inhalig,
null.verse 70:23: En in hun gebeden volharden
null.verse 70:24: En degenen in wier rijkdommen een vastgesteld deel is
null.verse 70:25: Voor de bedelaar en voor hem die niet bedelen kan
null.verse 70:26: En degenen die de Dag des Oordeels aannemen.
null.verse 70:27: En degenen die de straf van hun Heer vrezen
null.verse 70:28: Voorwaar, er is geen beveiliging voor de straf van hun Heer -
null.verse 70:29: En degenen die onthouding betrachten.
null.verse 70:30: - Uitgezonderd met hun vrouwen en degenen die zij bezitten, waarvoor hen geen blaam treft.
null.verse 70:31: Maar degenen die buiten deze (voorschriften) handelen zijn overtreders -
null.verse 70:32: En degenen die het hun toevertrouwde bewaren en hun verdragen nakomen,
null.verse 70:33: En degenen die oprecht zijn in hun getuigenissen,
null.verse 70:34: En degenen die hun gebeden naleven,
null.verse 70:35: Zij zijn het die in de tuinen zullen worden geëerd.
null.verse 70:36: Maar wat scheelt de ongelovigen die zich naar u toe spoeden
null.verse 70:37: Van rechts en links in groepen?
null.verse 70:38: Verwacht elk hunner de tuin van verrukking binnen te gaan?
null.verse 70:39: Stellig niet! Wij zijn het Die hen hebben geschapen uit hetgeen zij weten.
null.verse 70:40: Maar neen! Ik zweer als Heer van het Oosten en het westen dat Wij macht hebben,
null.verse 70:41: In hun plaats betere (volkeren) dan zij voort te brengen en Wij kunnen (daarin) niet worden verhinderd.
null.verse 70:42: Laten zij zich aan ijdele gesprekken overgeven en zich vermaken tot zij de Dag tegemoet gaan welke hun beloofd is,
null.verse 70:43: De Dag waarop zij zich uit hun graven zullen haasten alsof zij zich naar een bepaald doel spoeden,
null.verse 70:44: Met hun ogen nedergeslagen; schande zal hen bedekken.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:1: A questioner questioned concerning the doom about to fall
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:2: Upon the disbelievers, which none can repel,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:3: From Allah, Lord of the Ascending Stairways
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:4: (Whereby) the angels and the Spirit ascend unto Him in a Day whereof the span is fifty thousand years.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:5: But be patient (O Muhammad) with a patience fair to see.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:6: Lo! they behold it afar off
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:8: The day when the sky will become as molten copper,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:9: And the hills become as flakes of wool,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:10: And no familiar friend will ask a question of his friend
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:11: Though they will be given sight of them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:12: And his spouse and his brother
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:13: And his kin that harboured him
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:14: And all that are in the earth, if then it might deliver him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:15: But nay! for lo! it is the fire of hell
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:17: It calleth him who turned and fled (from truth),
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:21: And, when good befalleth him, grudging;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:23: Who are constant at their worship
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:24: And in whose wealth there is a right acknowledged
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:25: For the beggar and the destitute;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:26: And those who believe in the Day of Judgment,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:27: And those who are fearful of their Lord’s doom -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:28: Lo! the doom of their Lord is that before which none can feel secure -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:29: And those who preserve their chastity
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:30: Save with their wives and those whom their right hands possess, for thus they are not blameworthy;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:31: But whoso seeketh more than that, those are they who are transgressors;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:32: And those who keep their pledges and their covenant,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:33: And those who stand by their testimony
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:34: And those who are attentive at their worship.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:35: These will dwell in Gardens, honoured.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:36: What aileth those who disbelieve, that they keep staring toward thee (O Muhammad), open-eyed,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:37: On the right and on the left, in groups ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:38: Doth every man among them hope to enter the Garden of Delight ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:40: But nay! I swear by the Lord of the rising-places and the setting-places of the planets that We verily are Able
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:41: To replace them by (others) better than them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:42: So let them chat and play until they meet their Day which they are promised,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:43: The day when they come forth from the graves in haste, as racing to a goal,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 70:44: With eyes aghast, abasement stupefying them: Such is the Day which they are promised.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:1: A questioner asked about a Penalty to befall-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:2: The Unbelievers, the which there is none to ward off,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:3: (A Penalty) from God, Lord of the Ways of Ascent.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:4: The angels and the spirit ascend unto him in a Day the measure whereof is (as) fifty thousand years:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:5: Therefore do thou hold Patience,- a Patience of beautiful (contentment).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:6: They see the (Day) indeed as a far-off (event):
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:8: The Day that the sky will be like molten brass,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:9: And the mountains will be like wool,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:10: And no friend will ask after a friend,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:11: Though they will be put in sight of each other,- the sinner’s desire will be: Would that he could redeem himself from the Penalty of that Day by (sacrificing) his children,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:14: And all, all that is on earth,- so it could deliver him:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:15: By no means! for it would be the Fire of Hell!-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:16: Plucking out (his being) right to the skull!-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:17: Inviting (all) such as turn their backs and turn away their faces (from the Right).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:18: And collect (wealth) and hide it (from use)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:19: Truly man was created very impatient;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:21: And niggardly when good reaches him;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:22: Not so those devoted to Prayer;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:23: Those who remain steadfast to their prayer;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:24: And those in whose wealth is a recognised right.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:25: For the (needy) who asks and him who is prevented (for some reason from asking);
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:26: And those who hold to the truth of the Day of Judgment;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:27: And those who fear the displeasure of their Lord,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:28: For their Lord’s displeasure is the opposite of Peace and Tranquillity;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:29: And those who guard their chastity,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:30: Except with their wives and the (captives) whom their right hands possess,- for (then) they are not to be blamed,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:31: But those who trespass beyond this are transgressors;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:32: And those who respect their trusts and covenants;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:33: And those who stand firm in their testimonies;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:34: And those who guard (the sacredness) of their worship;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:35: Such will be the honoured ones in the Gardens (of Bliss).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:36: Now what is the matter with the Unbelievers that they rush madly before thee-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:37: From the right and from the left, in crowds?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:38: Does every man of them long to enter the Garden of Bliss?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:39: By no means! For We have created them out of the (base matter) they know!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:40: Now I do call to witness the Lord of all points in the East and the West that We can certainly-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:41: Substitute for them better (men) than they; And We are not to be defeated (in Our Plan).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:42: So leave them to plunge in vain talk and play about, until they encounter that Day of theirs which they have been promised!-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:43: The Day whereon they will issue from their sepulchres in sudden haste as if they were rushing to a goal-post (fixed for them),-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 70:44: Their eyes lowered in dejection,- ignominy covering them (all over)! such is the Day the which they are promised!

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:1: A questioner asked of a chastisement about to fall
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:2: for the unbelievers, which none may avert,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:3: from God, the Lord of the Stairways.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:4: To Him the angels and the Spirit mount up, in a day whereof the measure is fifty thousand years.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:5: So be thou patient with a sweet patience;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:6: behold, they see it as if far off;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:7: but We see it is nigh.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:8: Upon the day when heaven shall be as molten copper
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:9: and the mountains shall be as plucked wool-tufts,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:10: no loyal friend shall question loyal friend,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:11: as they are given sight of them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:14: and whosoever is in the earth, all together, so that then it might deliver him.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:15: Nay, verily it is a furnace
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:17: calling him who drew back and turned away,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:24: those in whose wealth is a right known
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:25: for the beggar and the outcast,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:26: who confirm the Day of Doom
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:27: and go in fear of the chastisement of their Lord
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:28: (from their Lord’s chastisement none feels secure)
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:30: save from their wives and what their right hands own, then not being blameworthy
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:31: (but whoso seeks after more than that, they are the transgressors),
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:32: and who preserve their trusts and their covenant,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:35: Those shall be in Gardens, high-honoured.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:36: What ails the unbelievers, running with outstretched necks
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:37: towards thee on the right hand and on the left hand in knots?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:38: What, is every man of them eager to be admitted to a Garden of Bliss?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:39: Not so; for We have created them of what they know.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:40: No! I swear by the Lord of the Easts and Wests, surely We are able
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:41: to substitute a better than they; We shall not be outstripped.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:42: Then leave them alone to plunge and play until they encounter that day of theirs which they are promised,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:43: the day they shall come forth from the tombs hastily, as if they were hurrying unto a waymark,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 70:44: humbled their eyes, overspreading them abasement.

Muhammad Asad.verse 70:1: ONE who is minded to ask might ask about the suffering which [in the hereafter] is bound to befall
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:3: [since it will come] from God, unto whom there are many ways of ascent:
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:4: all the angels and all the inspiration [ever granted to man] ascend unto Him
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:5: in a day the length whereof is
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:7: Therefore, [O believer,] endure all adversity with goodly patience:
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:10: but We see it as near!
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:11: [It will take place] on a Day when the sky will be like molten lead,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:12: and the mountains will be like tufts of wool,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:14: no friend will ask about his friend,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:15: though they may be in one another’s sight:
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:16: everyone who was lost in sin will on that Day but desire to ransom himself from suffering at the price of his own children,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:17: and of his spouse, and of his brother,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:18: and of all the kinsfolk who ever sheltered him,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:20: lives on earth, all of them – so that he could but save himself.
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:21: But nay! Verily, all [that awaits him] is a raging flame,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:23: It will claim all such as turn their backs [on what is right], and turn away [from the truth],
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:25: and thereupon withhold [it from their fellow-men].
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:26: VERILY, man is born with a restless disposition.
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:27: [As a rule,] whenever misfortune touches him, he is filled with self-pity;
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:28: and whenever good fortune comes to him, he selfishly withholds it [from others].
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:29: Not so, however, those who consciously turn towards God in prayer,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:31: who incessantly persevere in their prayer;
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:32: and in whose possessions there is a due share, acknowledged [by them],
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:33: for such as ask [for help] and such as are deprived [of what is good in life];
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:34: and who accept as true the [coming of the] Day of Judgment;
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:35: and who stand in dread of their Sustainer’s chastisement
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:36: for, behold, of their Sustainer’s chastisement none may ever feel
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:38: and who are mindful of their chastity,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:39: [not giving way to their desires] with any but their spouses – that is, those whom they rightfully possess [through wedlock] – for then, behold, they are free of all blame,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:40: whereas such as seek to go beyond that
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:42: and who are faithful to their trusts and to their pledges;
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:43: and who stand firm whenever they bear witness;
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:44: and who guard their prayers [from all worldly intent].
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:45: These it is who in the gardens [of paradise] shall be honoured!
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:46: WHAT, THEN, is amiss with such as are bent on denying the truth, that they run about confusedly to and fro before thee,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:47: [coming upon thee] from the right and from the left, in crowds?
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:48: Does every one of them hope to enter [by this means] a garden of bliss?
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:49: Never! For, behold, We have created them out of something that they know [only too well]!
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:50: But nay! I call to witness [Our being] the Sustainer of all the points of sunrise and sunset: verily, well able are We
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:52: better than they are; for there is nothing to prevent Us [from doing what We will].
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:53: Hence, leave them to indulge in idle talk and play [with words] until they face that
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:54: Day of theirs which they have been promised
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:55: the Day when they shall come forth in haste from their graves, as if racing towards a goal-post,
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:56: with downcast eyes, with ignominy overwhelming them: that Day which they were promised again and again.
Muhammad Asad.verse 70:57: ascents”: a metonymical phrase implying that there are many ways by which man can “ascend” to a comprehension of God’s existence, and thus to spiritual “nearness” to Him – and that, therefore, it is up to each human being to avail himself of any of the ways leading towards Him (cf.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:1: A demanding person has asked for the punishment that is going to befall
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:2: the disbelievers; there is no one to avert it,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:3: (and it will come) from Allah, the Lord of the stairways,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:4: to whom ascend the angels and the Spirit in a day the length of which is fifty thousand years.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:5: So, observe patience, a good patience.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:8: (This punishment will befall) on the Day when the sky will be like dregs of oil,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:9: and the mountains will be like dyed wool,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:10: and no friend will ask about any friend,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:11: (though) they will be made to see each other.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:12: and his wife and his brother,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:13: and his kindred that sheltered him,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:14: and all those on earth, then he may redeem himself.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:15: By no means! It is the flaming fire
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:16: that will pull out the skin of the scalp.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:17: It will call him who had turned his back and fled away (from the truth)
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:19: Indeed man is created weak in courage,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:20: very upset when touched by evil,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:21: and very niggard when visited by good (fortune),
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:23: who are regular in their Salāh,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:24: and those in whose riches there is a specified right
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:25: for the one who asks and the one who is deprived,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:26: and those who believe in the Day of Judgment as true,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:27: and those who are fearful of the torment of their Lord-
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:28: -Indeed the torment of their Lord is not something to be fearless from.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:29: and those who guard their private parts,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:30: except from their wives and those (slave-girls) owned by their hands,- because they are not to be blamed,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:31: but the one who seeks (sexual gratification) beyond that, then such people are the transgressors,-
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:32: and those who are careful about their trusts and covenants,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:33: and those who are upright in their testimonies,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:34: and those who take due care of their Salāh .
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:35: Those will be honoured in gardens (of Jannah ).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:36: So what has happened to those who disbelieve that they are rushing towards you
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:37: from the right and from the left, in groups?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:38: Does every one of them aspire to be admitted to the garden of bliss?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:39: By no means! We have created them from what they know.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:40: So, I swear by the Lord of the points of sunrise and those of sunset, We are powerful
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:41: to bring those better than them in their place, and We are not to be frustrated.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:42: So, leave them involved in pastime and play until they encounter their Day, which they are promised,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:43: the Day they will come out of the graves quickly, as if they were rushing toward idols,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 70:44: with their eyes downcast, enveloped by ignominy.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:1: A petitioner petitioned an impending chastisement
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:2: — which in the case of the disbelievers none can avert —
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:3: from God, Lord of the Ascensions.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:4: To Him ascend the angels and the Spirit in a day whose span is fifty thousand years.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:5: So be patient with a graceful patience.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:8: while We see it [to be] near.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:9: The day when the heaven will be as molten silver,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:10: and the mountains will be as flakes of wool.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:11: And no friend will inquire about his friend.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:14: and his companion, and his brother,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:15: and his kin that had sheltered him,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:16: and all who are on earth, if it might then deliver him.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:17: Nay! Lo! [for him] it will be the Churning Fire
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:19: it will call him who turned his back and ignored,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:23: when evil befalls him, [he is] anxious,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:24: and when good befalls him, [he is] grudging,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:27: and in whose wealth there is an acknowledged due,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:28: for the beggar and the deprived,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:29: and who affirm the truth of the Day of Judgement,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:30: and who are apprehensive of the chastisement of their Lord —
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:31: lo! there is no security from the chastisement of their Lord —
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:32: and those who guard their private parts,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:33: except from their wives and those whom their right hands own, for in that case they are not blameworthy;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:34: but whoever seeks beyond that, those are the infringers,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:35: and those who are keepers, of their trusts and their covenant,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:36: and who stand firm in their testimony,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:38: Those will be in Gardens, honoured.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:39: So what is wrong with those who disbelieve that they keep staring towards you
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:40: to the right and to the left in droves?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:41: Does each one of them hope to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:42: Nay! Indeed We created them from what they know.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:43: For verily I swear by the Lord of the rising-places and the setting-places, that We are able
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:46: better than them, and We are not to be outmanoeuvred.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:47: So leave them to indulge and to play, until they encounter that day of theirs, which they are promised;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:48: the day when they will come forth from the graves hastening, as if racing to a
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 70:50: with their eyes humbled, overcast by abasement.

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:1: A questioner asked for the torment which is sure to come about,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:2: Upon the disbelievers, which no one can repel.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:3: (That will befall) from Allah, Who is the Lord of the Ascending Steps to Heaven (and of the higher ranks and grades of spiritual hierarchy).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:4: The angels and al-Ruh al-Amin (the Spirit) rise towards His (Throne) in a Day which measures fifty thousand years (according to the worldly scale).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:5: So, (O Beloved,) observe patience (on the assertions of the disbelievers) without regrets.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:6: Surely, they imagine that (Day) to be far off,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:7: But We see it very near.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:8: On that Day the sky will become like molten copper,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:9: And the mountains like (flakes of) coloured wool,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:10: And no friend will enquire after his friend,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:11: (Though) they will be shown (to one another).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:12: And (by giving) his wife and his brother,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:13: And (all) his family who used to provide him shelter,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:14: And all the people on earth (as recompense for himself), so that this (atonement) may save him from (Allah’s torment).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:15: But no! By no means! Surely, that is a Flaming Fire,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:16: Stripping off the skin of all the limbs and the scalp.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:17: It is calling him who turned his back (on the truth) and turned away,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:18: And (he who) accumulated wealth and then held it (from distribution).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:19: Surely, man has been created impatient and greedy.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:20: He gets upset and worried when some hardship (or financial loss) afflicts him,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:21: But becomes miserly when he receives good fortune (or affluence),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:22: Except for those who offer Prayer,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:23: And are constant in their Prayer,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:24: And those (who are committed to sacrifice and) in whose wealth there is a fixed share,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:25: Of one who begs and of one who is needy but does not beg,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:26: And those who affirm the Day of Requital,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:27: And those who fear the torment of their Lord;
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:28: Surely, the torment of their Lord is not a thing which should not be feared;
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:29: And those who safeguard their private parts,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:30: Except from their wives or the female slaves they possess.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:31: But he who looks for more than that, then it is they who transgress the limits.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:32: And those who safeguard their trusts and promises,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:33: And those who stand firm on their testimonies,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:34: And those who safeguard their Prayers,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:35: It is they who will enjoy great honour and respect in the Gardens.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:36: So what is the matter with the disbelievers that they are coming towards you running,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:37: From the right as well as the left, in groups?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:38: Does every one of them hope that he may be admitted to the Garden of Bliss (without faith and deeds)?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:39: Certainly not! Surely, We have created them from a substance which they (also) know.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:40: So I swear by the Lord of the easts and the wests that surely We have Absolute Power,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:41: To replace them with people better than them and We are not at all incapable (of doing it).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:42: So leave them occupied with their absurd talk and pastime until they meet that Day of theirs which they have been promised.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:43: The Day when they will come forth from their graves in haste as if they are running towards the temples of their idols.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 70:44: (Their plight) will be that their eyes will be cast down (with shame and fear) and disgrace enveloping them.

null.verse 70:1: Eräs tiedonhaluinen kyseli, millainen on kuritus, joka on tuleva
null.verse 70:2: epäuskoisten osaksi.
null.verse 70:3: Se tulee Jumalalta, nousevain portaitten Herralta.
null.verse 70:4: Enkelit ja henki nousevat Hänen tykönsä päivänä, jonka pituus on viisikymmentä tuhatta vuotta.
null.verse 70:6: He kuvittelevat sen olevan kaukana,
null.verse 70:7: mutta Me näemme sen läheltä.
null.verse 70:8: Sinä päivänä, jolloin taivas on oleva kuin sulaa kuparia
null.verse 70:9: ja vuoret kuin villaa,
null.verse 70:10: jolloin ystävä ei kysy ystävää,
null.verse 70:11: vaikka he näkevät toisensa.
null.verse 70:13: sukulaisensa, jotka antoivat hänelle suojaa,
null.verse 70:14: jopa kaikki, jotka maan päälle on luotu, kunhan hän niiden avulla lunastaisi itsensä.
null.verse 70:15: Ei mitenkään! Sillä katso, tämä on leimuava liekki,
null.verse 70:17: ja vaatii omakseen sen, joka kääntyi pois ja pakeni
null.verse 70:18: ja joka ahnaasti kokosi rikkautta.
null.verse 70:19: Totisesti on ihminen luotu epävakaiseksi mieleltään:
null.verse 70:20: Kun jokin paha kohtaa häntä, hän on kärkäs valittamaan,
null.verse 70:21: mutta kun jotakin hyvää annetaan hänen osalleen, hän on kiittämätön,
null.verse 70:23: jotka uskollisesti suorittavat rukouksensa,
null.verse 70:24: niitä, joiden rikkaudessa on määrätty osa
null.verse 70:25: kerjäläistä ja osatonta varten;
null.verse 70:26: niitä, jotka uskovat tuomion päivään,
null.verse 70:27: ja jotka pelkäävät Herransa kuritusta
null.verse 70:28: ei kukaan, totisesti, saata säästyä kuritukselta, joka on heidän Herraltansa tuleva,
null.verse 70:29: sekä lukuunottamatta niitä, jotka hillitsevät halujaan
null.verse 70:30: paitsi vaimojensa ja orjattariensa suhteen, koska heissä silloin ei ole moittimista.
null.verse 70:31: Toisin on niiden, jotka pyrkivät ylittämään tämän, sillä ne ovat lain rikkojia.
null.verse 70:32: Ne, jotka ovat rehellisiä sopimuksissaan ja siinä, mitä heidän huostaansa on uskottu,
null.verse 70:33: jotka ovat vilpittömiä todistaessaan
null.verse 70:34: ja jotka ahkeroivat hartauden harjoituksissa,
null.verse 70:35: saavat elää paratiisin kunniassa.
null.verse 70:36: Mutta mitä ajattelevat uskottomat, jotka avosilmin rientävät sinun edelläsi,
null.verse 70:37: oikealta ja vasemmalta, ryhmä toisensa jälkeen?
null.verse 70:38: Kuvitteleeko heistä kukin pääsevänsä autuuden puutarhaan?
null.verse 70:39: Totisesti ei! Totisesti he tietävät, mistä Me olemme luonut heidät.
null.verse 70:40: Mutta ei! Vannon idän ja lännen Herran nimessä: »Totisesti Me voimme
null.verse 70:41: nostaa heidän sijalleen ne, jotka ovat heitä paremmat, eikä Meitä voi tästä mikään estää.
null.verse 70:42: Anna siis heidän jäädä turhien puheittensa varaan ja laskea leikkiä, kunnes heitä katsoo silmästä silmään se päivä, joka on heille ennustettu.
null.verse 70:43: Sinä päivänä he tulevat esiin haudoistaan kiirehtien, aivan kuin maalia kohti kiitäen,
null.verse 70:44: silmät maahan luotuina, häpeän valtaamina.

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:1: Un questionneur a questionné sur le châtiment qui échoira
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:2: aux mécréants, que nul ne peut repousser,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:3: qui vient de Dieu, le Maître des degrés ascendants.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:4: Les anges et l'Esprit montent vers Lui en un jour dont la durée est de cinquante mille ans.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:7: alors que Nous le voyons tout proche.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:8: Ce Jour-là, le ciel sera comme du métal fondu
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:9: et les montagnes comme des flocons de laine.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:10: Nul ami dévoué ne s'enquerra de son ami
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:13: son clan qui lui donnait l'asile
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:14: et tout ceux qui sont sur la terre, afin d'être sauvé.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:17: il appelle celui qui s'est retourné et s'est enfui,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:19: Certes, l'homme a été créé inquiet,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:22: à l'exception de ceux qui prient,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:23: de ceux qui sont constants dans leur prière,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:24: de ceux sur les biens desquels il existe un droit reconnu
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:25: en faveur du mendiant et de l'indigent,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:26: de ceux qui déclarent véridique le Jour du Jugement,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:27: de ceux qui redoutent le châtiment de leur Seigneur
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:28: ne se sachant pas à l'abri du châtiment de leur Seigneur ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:29: à l'exception de ceux qui préservent leur chasteté,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:30: sauf avec leurs épouses et avec celles que possède leur main droite, car alors ils ne sont pas blâmables,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:31: tandis que ceux qui en convoitent d'autres sont transgresseurs ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:32: à l'exception de ceux qui gardent les dépôts qu'on leur a confiés et qui remplissent leurs engagements,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:33: de ceux dont le témoignage est sûr,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:34: de ceux qui s'acquittent de la prière :
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:35: ceux-là auront une place d'honneur dans des Jardins.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:36: Qu'ont donc ceux qui mécroient à se tenir devant toi les yeux écarquillés,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:37: venant par groupes de droite et de gauche ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:38: Chacun d'eux voudrait-il être introduit dans le Jardin du délice ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:40: J'en jure par le Seigneur des Orients et des Occidents : Nous avons le pouvoir
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:41: de les remplacer par des hommes meilleurs qu'eux, et nul ne peut Nous devancer.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:42: Laisse-les donc ergoter et jouer jusqu'au moment où ils rencontreront le Jour qui leur a été promis ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 70:43: le Jour où ils sortiront des tombeaux, rapides comme s'ils couraient vers des bornes d'arrivée,

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:1: Un demandeur a réclamé un châtiment inéluctable,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:2: pour les mécréants, que nul ne pourrait repousser,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:3: et qui vient de Dieu, le Maître des voies d’ascension.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:4: Les Anges ainsi que l’Esprit montent vers Lui en un jour dont la durée est de cinquante mille ans.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:6: Ils le (le châtiment) voient bien loin,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:7: alors que Nous le voyons bien proche,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:8: le jour où le ciel sera comme du métal en fusion
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:9: et les montagnes comme de la laine,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:10: où nul ami dévoué ne s’enquerra d’un ami,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:11: bien qu’ils se voient l’un l’autre.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:13: même son clan qui lui donnait asile,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:14: et tout ce qui est sur la terre, tout, qui pourrait le sauver.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:17: arrachant brutalement la peau du crâne.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:18: Il appellera celui qui tournait le dos et s’en allait,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:20: Oui, l’homme a été créé instable [très inquiet];
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:21: quand le malheur le touche, il est abattu;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:22: et quand le bonheur le touche, il est refuseur.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:23: Sauf ceux qui pratiquent la Salat
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:24: qui sont assidu à leurs Salats,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:25: et sur les bien desquels il y a un droit bien déterminé [la Zakat]
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:26: pour le mendiant et le déshérité;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:27: et qui déclarent véridique le Jour de la Rétribution,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:28: et ceux qui craignent le châtiment de leur Seigneur
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:29: car vraiment, il n’y a nulle assurance contre le châtiment de leur Seigneur;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:30: et qui se maintiennent dans la chasteté
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:31: et n’ont pas de rapports qu’avec leurs épouses ou les esclaves qu’ils possèdent car dans ce cas, ils ne sont pas blâmables,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:32: mais ceux qui cherchent [leur plaisir] en dehors de cela, sont des transgresseurs;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:33: et qui gardent les dépôts confiés à eux, et respectent leurs engagements scrupuleusement.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:34: et qui témoignent de la stricte vérité,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:35: et qui sont régulier dans leur Salat.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:36: Ceux-là seront honorés dans des Jardins.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:37: Qu’ont donc, ceux qui ont mécru, à courir vers toi, le cou tendu,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:40: Chacun d’eux convoite-t-il qu’on le laisse entrer au Jardin des délices ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:41: Mais non ! Nous les avons créés de ce qu’ils savent .
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:43: De les remplacer par de meilleurs qu’eux, et nul ne peut Nous en empêcher.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:44: Laisse-les donc s’enfoncer (dans leur mécréance) et se divertir jusqu’à ce qu’ils rencontrent leur jour dont on les menaçait,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:45: le jour où ils sortiront des tombes, rapides comme s’ils couraient vers des pierres dressées;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 70:46: leurs yeux seront abaissés, l’avilissement les couvrira.

null.verse 70:1: Ein Fragender fragt nach der Strafe, die da treffen wird
null.verse 70:2: Die Ungläubigen - es kann sie keiner abwehren -
null.verse 70:3: Von Allah, dem Hohen.
null.verse 70:4: Die Engel und der Geist steigen zu Ihm in einem Tage, dessen Maß fünfzigtausend Jahre sind.
null.verse 70:5: Gedulde dich drum in geziemender Geduld.
null.verse 70:6: Sie wähnen, er sei ferne;
null.verse 70:7: Aber Wir sehen, er ist nahe.
null.verse 70:8: Am Tage, da der Himmel wie geschmolzenes Erz sein wird
null.verse 70:9: Und die Berge wie farbige Wollflocken,
null.verse 70:10: Und ein Freund nicht nach einem Freunde fragen wird.
null.verse 70:11: Sie werden in Sehweite zueinander gebracht werden, und der Schuldige würde sich wohl loskaufen von der Strafe jenes Tages mit seinen Kindern
null.verse 70:12: Und seiner Gattin und seinem Bruder
null.verse 70:13: Und seiner Verwandtschaft, die ihn beherbergt hat,
null.verse 70:14: Und allen, die auf Erden sind insgesamt, ob es ihn nur retten wollte.
null.verse 70:15: Doch nein! wahrlich, es ist eine Feuerflamme -
null.verse 70:17: Den wird sie rufen, der den Rücken kehrt und sich abwendet
null.verse 70:18: Und (Reichtum) aufhäuft und (damit) geizt.
null.verse 70:19: Wahrlich, der Mensch ist aus Ungeduld geschaffen;
null.verse 70:20: Wenn ihn Schlimmes trifft, ist er voller Klage,
null.verse 70:21: Doch wenn ihm Gutes widerfährt, ist er knausrig.
null.verse 70:22: Nicht so sind die, die beten
null.verse 70:23: Und bei ihrem Gebet verharren,
null.verse 70:24: Und die, in deren Reichtum ein bestimmter Anteil ist
null.verse 70:25: Für den Bittenden sowohl wie für den, der es nicht kann.
null.verse 70:26: Und die, die den Tag des Gerichts für wahr und wirklich erklären,
null.verse 70:27: Und die, die vor der Strafe ihres Herrn zagen -
null.verse 70:28: Wahrlich, die Strafe ihres Herrn ist nicht, wovor man sicher sein könnte -,
null.verse 70:29: Und die, die ihre Sinnlichkeit im Zaum halten,
null.verse 70:30: Es sei denn mit ihren Gattinnen oder denen, die ihre Rechte besitzt, denn da sind sie nicht zu tadeln,
null.verse 70:31: Die aber mehr als das suchen, sind Übertreter.
null.verse 70:32: Und die, die das ihnen Anvertraute und ihren Vertrag halten,
null.verse 70:33: Und die, die aufrichtig sind in ihrem Zeugnis,
null.verse 70:34: Und die, die ihr Gebet getreulich verrichten;
null.verse 70:35: Diese sind es, die in den Gärten sein werden, hochgeehrt.
null.verse 70:36: Was aber ist denen, die ungläubig sind, daß sie auf dich zugelaufen kommen
null.verse 70:37: Von rechts und links, gruppenweise gesondert?
null.verse 70:38: Hofft jeder einzelne von ihnen wohl, den Garten der Wonne zu betreten?
null.verse 70:39: Nimmermehr! Wir erschufen sie aus dem, was sie wissen.
null.verse 70:40: Aber nein! Ich schwöre beim Herrn des Ostens und des Westens, daß Wir imstande sind,
null.verse 70:41: Bessere als sie an ihre Stelle zu setzen, und keiner kann Uns hindern.
null.verse 70:42: So laß sie nur in eitler Rede sich ergehen und sich vergnügen, bis sie ihrem Tag begegnen, der ihnen angedroht ward,
null.verse 70:43: Dem Tag, da sie aus ihren Gräbern hervorkommen werden in Hast, als eilten sie zu einem Ziel.
null.verse 70:44: Ihre Augen werden niedergeschlagen sein; Schmach wird sie bedecken.
